casebody.data:
LEVEL 3 COMMUNICATIONS, LLC
v.
Charles G. COUCH, Jr., Joe C. Young, Trustee, U/A/ Dated December 24, 1992 with Wayne T. Upchurch and Elizabeth C. Upchurch, Known as the Barry Upchurch Trust, Joe C. Young, Trustee, U/A/ Dated December 24, 1992 with Wayne T. Upchurch and Elizabeth C. Upchurch, Known as the Graves Upchurch Trust. No. 412PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Raleigh, Mark P. Henriques, Sarah A. Motley, Charlotte, for Level 3 Communications. Bruce M. Simpson, Charlotte, for Couch, et al.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of August 2006 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."

Petitioner shall forthwith submit an appeal bond to this Court, as provided by Appellate Rule 17(b). The bond may be in cash or by a written undertaking with good and sufficient surety in the sum of $250.00. Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2). Justice HUDSON recused.
